name: Millennium Child Table
descr:
Chiroform has developed a first class serie of treatment- and examination equipment in co-operation with doctors, designer teams, engineers and the industry. The Chiroform Millennium equipment wears the global patent and trademark, and focus on both the patient and practitioner. New perspectives and options will open up with the Chiroform Millennium equipment.

The Chiroform Millennium Portable Child Table. The unique anatomical shape and oval design makes both the examination and treatment excellent, and at the same time the child is safe and secured. The experience by using this table will impress any parent. Can be used anywhere on a firm, safe base.

Recommended by Kirokids and Dr. Neil Davies.

5 years of warranty at the foam. Upholstery 1 year of warranty.
